# to create a datetime of 01-05-2019 09:12:43 EST; all arguments are numeric with exception of tz (time zone)
make_datetime(year = 2019, 
              month = 01, 
              day = 05, 
              hour = 09, 
              min = 12, 
              sec = 43, 
              tz = \EST\")
